Mayor & City Council
====================

Meetings
--------

* Held at 226 Countryside Dr. Aubrey, TX 76227
* 6:00 p.m.
* 4th Thursday of every month

Meetings are subject to change when they fall on a holiday.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available at least 72 hours prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](http://www.aubreytx.gov/129/Agendas-Minutes)

![City Council 2025 Image](https://www.aubreytx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=1724)

Mayor and Council Members
-------------------------

* Chris Rich, Mayor (Term expires May 2028)  
  [Email Chris Rich](mailto:crich@aubreytx.gov)
* Jeff Perry, Place 1 (Term expires May 2026)  
  [Email Jeff Perry](mailto:jperry@aubreytx.gov)
* Matt Jones, Place 2  (Term expires May 2027)  
  [Email Matt Jones](mailto:mjones@aubreytx.gov)
* Mike Browning, Place 3 (Term expires May 2028)  
  [Email Mike Browning](mailto:mbrowning@aubreytx.gov)
* Randy Jones, Place 4  (Term expires May 2026)  
  [Email Randy Jones](mailto:rjones@aubreytx.gov)
* Chuck Fikes, Place 5  (Term expires May 2027)  
  [Email Chuck Fikes](mailto:cfikes@aubreytx.gov)

Overview
--------

The City Council is dedicated to preserving Aubrey's unique quality of life while planning for sustainable growth.
